channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Simple, scalable, and global: Containers are coming to Cloudflare Workers in June 2025】简单，可扩展和全球：2025年6月的集装箱即将到达Cloudflare工人
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Containers are coming this June. Run new types of workloads on our network with an experience that is simple, scalable, global and deeply integrated with Workers. 】Cloudflare容器将于今年6月到来。在我们的网络上运行新型的工作负载类型，具有简单，可扩展，全局且与工人深入融合的体验。

item.title: 【Why I joined Cloudflare as Chief People Officer — Kelly Russell】为什么我加入Cloudflare担任首席人物 - 凯利·罗素（Kelly Russell）
item.description: 【 After years navigating the world of high-growth tech, I’ve learned to recognize a special opportunity when I see one. That’s exactly why I’m thrilled to join Cloudflare as Chief People Officer. 】经过多年的高增长技术世界，当我看到一个人时，我学会了认识到一个特殊的机会。这就是为什么我很高兴加入Cloudflare担任首席人物。

item.title: 【Why I joined Cloudflare: to build world-class partnerships in EMEA 】为什么我加入CloudFlare：在EMEA建立世界一流的合作伙伴关系
item.description: 【 The EMEA region is a patchwork of diverse markets, industries, and regulatory environments, and it demands a partner-centric approach. That’s why I joined Cloudflare as VP of EMEA Partnerships. 】EMEA地区是各种市场，行业和监管环境的拼凑而成，它需要以合作伙伴为中心的方法。这就是为什么我加入CloudFlare担任EMEA合作伙伴关系副总裁。

item.title: 【How the April 28, 2025, power outage in Portugal and Spain impacted Internet traffic and connectivity】2025年4月28日，葡萄牙和西班牙的停电如何影响互联网流量和连通性
item.description: 【 A massive power outage struck significant portions of Portugal and Spain at 10:34 UTC on April 28, disrupting everyday activities and services. 】4月28日，UTC的大量停电袭击了葡萄牙和西班牙的大部分，破坏了日常活动和服务。

item.title: 【New year, no shutdowns: the Q1 2025 Internet disruption summary】新年，没有关闭：Q1 2025 Internet中断摘要
item.description: 【 In Q1 2025, we observed Internet disruptions around the world caused by cable damage, power outages, natural disasters, fire, a cyberattack, and technical problems. 】在2025年第1季度，我们观察到由电缆损坏，停电，自然灾害，火灾，网络攻击和技术问题引起的世界各地的互联网中断。

item.title: 【Startup spotlight: building AI agents and accelerating innovation with Cohort #5】启动聚光灯：建立AI代理商并加速与队列的创新
item.description: 【 Discover how developers are using Cloudflare to scale AI workloads and streamline automation and how participants in Workers Launchpad Cohort #4 have built, and startups participating in Cohort #5 】查找开发人员如何使用CloudFlare来扩展AI工作负载和简化自动化以及工人的参与者如何构建了Launchpad Cohort＃4，以及参与COHORT＃5的初创公司

item.title: 【Developer Week 2025 wrap-up】开发人员第2025周总结
item.description: 【 We’ve closed out Developer Week 2025. Here’s a quick recap of the announcements and in-depth technical explorations that went out during the week. 】我们已经关闭了第2025周的开发人员。这是对一周内进行的公告和深入的技术探索的快速回顾。

item.title: 【Targeted by 20.5 million DDoS attacks, up 358% year-over-year: Cloudflare’s 2025 Q1 DDoS Threat Report】由2050万个DDOS攻击的目标，同比增长358％：Cloudflare的2025 Q1 DDOS威胁报告
item.description: 【 DDoS attacks are surging. In 2025 Q1, Cloudflare blocked +20M attacks (a 358% YoY spike) along with 5.6 Tbps and 4.8 Bpps record-breaking attacks. 】DDOS攻击正在激增。在2025年第1季度，Cloudflare与5.6 TBP和4.8 BPP的创纪录攻击相同，阻塞了 +20m攻击（358％的尖峰）。

item.title: 【Bringing streamable HTTP transport and Python language support to MCP servers】将流媒体的HTTP传输和Python语言支持带到MCP服务器
item.description: 【 We're continuing to make it easier for developers to bring their services into the AI ecosystem with the Model Context Protocol (MCP) with two new updates. 】我们将继续通过模型上下文协议（MCP）进行两个新更新，使开发人员更容易将他们的服务带入AI生态系统。

item.title: 【A global virtual private cloud for building secure cross-cloud apps on Cloudflare Workers】用于在Cloudflare工人上构建安全横云应用程序的全局虚拟私有云
item.description: 【 We’re announcing Workers VPC: a global private network that allows applications deployed on Cloudflare Workers to connect to your legacy cloud infrastructure. 】我们宣布工人VPC：一个全球专用网络，允许在CloudFlare工人上部署的应用程序连接到您的传统云基础架构。
